meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fragrant.
meanings.sent1: The fragrancy of the flowers filled the room with a delightful scent.
meanings.sent2: I love the fragrancy of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The fragrancy of the perfume was so strong that it tickled my nose.
meanings.sent4: The fragrancy of success lingered in the air long after the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The fragrancy of the pine forest was so intense, it felt like walking through a scented paradise.

meanings.sent1: The fragrancy of the roses in the garden was enchanting.
meanings.sent2: She followed the fragrancy of the freshly brewed coffee to the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The fragrancy of the bakery made her crave pastries all day.
meanings.sent4: The fragrancy of nostalgia wafted through the old photo album.
meanings.sent5: The fragrancy of the ocean breeze instantly lifted her spirits.
